topics.body:
after finishing the game and buying a dlc, i am now packing a gun EVERYTIME in sleeping dogs.

i laugh at triads who try to melee me, cause i just headshot them and move on

but i cant fire constantly or the police hears me and chases me.

however, with the upgrade to get shotguns from police trucks,and the dlc to get police cars, its fun tos tart mass shootings in highways since its also easier to shoot the police there.

topics.body:
I know gasmaskangel jokes about how in 2015 he's going to binge drink cause of how painful the 2016 elections are going to be, but I think I'm going to join him.

If you're wondering what I mean by this is apparently the news has given up all logic and factual thinking to build up the election as possible.  What I mean by this is that the 24/7 "news" has officially forgone the use of their higher brain functions to perform yellow journalism.  If you're wondering how bad they're dropping their higher brain functions they have begun to claim that hispanics and such will flip over completely to the republicans side and change the election. . . anyone that knows voting trends just facepalmed hard at this.  It gets progressively more stupid.


Tl:dr; news in a nutshell: "I'm ignoring factual evidence so therefore it doesn't exist".
